function.name: create_note
function.description: Creates a new note with the given text. Call this tool if asked to be reminded or to take a note.

text.description: The text of the note, usually a direct quote from the user

function.name: set_alarm
function.description: Sets an alarm for a specific time.

time_hours.description: The hour component of the alarm time (24 hour time)

time_minutes.description: The minute component of the alarm time (0-59)

function.name: set_timer_absolute
function.description: Sets a timer to go off at an absolute day and time.

day_offset.description: The offset of the day to remind the user at e.g. 'tomorrow', 'today', 'thursday' (will be the next thursday), '3' (will be in 3 days)

time_hours.description: The hour component of the desired end time (24 hour time)

time_minutes.description: The minute component of the desired end time (0-59)

function.name: set_timer
function.description: Sets a timer for a relative duration (hours, minutes, seconds).

time_hours.description: The number of hours on the timer

time_minutes.description: The number of minutes on the timer

time_seconds.description: The number of seconds on the timer

function.name: reminder_absolute
function.description: Creates a reminder for a specific absolute date and time.

day_offset.description: The offset of the day to remind the user at e.g. 'tomorrow', 'today', 'thursday' (will be the next thursday), '3' (will be in 3 days)

absolute_time_hour.description: The absolute time to remind the user at as a 24 hour hour part e.g. '17'

absolute_time_minute.description: The absolute time to remind the user at as a minute part e.g. '30', or '00' for the top of the hour

date_month_day.description: The date to remind the user at if specified by the user as a date part (month-day) e.g. '12-31'

date_year.description: The year to remind the user at if specified by the user as a year part e.g. '2022'

message.description: The message to remind the user e.g. 'Buy more milk'

function.name: create_reminder_relative
function.description: When the user requires a reminder at a relative time e.g. 'in 5 minutes' use the create_reminder_relative tool.

relative_time.description: The relative time to remind the user at as n 'time_unit's in the future

time_unit.description: The unit of time for the relative time. Must be one of: ["seconds", "minutes", "hours", "days", "weeks", "months", "years"]

message.description: The message to remind the user e.g. 'Buy more milk'
